attributes.action: Stop covid 19 restrictions and go for herd immunity
attributes.additional_details: Would like parliament to take a good look at the restrictions on covid 19 they dont make any sense no more than groups of 6 but fine for schools and places of work. A mask in a shop but not in a pub. Let's go for herd immunity when this virus has a high survival rate.
attributes.background: I would like the government to let the country go back to normal and go for herd immunity with covid 19. Its a virus with a high survival rate and people or being restricted for it. And all the restrictions do not make any sense you can go in a pub for hours and don't need a mask but do in a shop
